author: Tan Lee Meng J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Chia Yang Pong v Singapore Medical Council
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Tan Lee Meng J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Myint Soe and Deepak Raja (Myint Soe and Selvaraj) for appellant; Philip Fong and Chang Man Phing (Harry Elias Partnership) for respondent
tags-parsed: Administrative Law/Disciplinary proceedings/Disciplinary Committee of Singapore Medical Council/Medical practitioner fined $65,000 on 80 counts of professional misconduct/Whether Disciplinary Committee empowered to impose fine exceeding $10,000/Section 45(2)(d) Medical Registration Act (Cap 174, 1998 Rev Ed)

Administrative Law/Disciplinary proceedings/Disciplinary Committee of Singapore Medical Council/Whether empowered to impose financial penalty on medical practitioner in addition to ordering his name be removed from the Register of Medical Practitioners/Sections 45(1), 45(2) Medical Registration Act (Cap 174, 1998 Rev Ed)
Courts and Jurisdiction/Appeals/Appeal against findings of Disciplinary Committee of Singapore Medical Council/Principles to be applied/Section 45(13) Medical Registration Act (Cap 174, 1998 Rev Ed)
